hero.name: Edris Jebran
hero.tagline: Senior Software Engineer • AI/ML Specialist • Full-Stack Architect

about.summary: I architect and build enterprise-scale software systems that handle millions of users. Passionate about AI/ML, distributed systems, and creating innovative solutions that solve real-world problems. I lead technical teams, mentor engineers, and drive engineering excellence.

highlights: Led development of microservices handling 50M+ daily requests with 99.99% uptime
Architected and implemented real-time inventory management system reducing latency by 60%
Mentored 8 junior engineers and established engineering best practices across 3 teams
Optimized database queries and caching strategies, improving system performance by 40%
Designed and deployed CI/CD pipelines reducing deployment time from 2 hours to 15 minutes
Built scalable REST APIs serving 10M+ monthly users with sub-100ms response times
Implemented real-time analytics dashboard processing 1TB+ data daily
Reduced AWS costs by 35% through infrastructure optimization and auto-scaling
Led migration from monolithic to microservices architecture
Established automated testing achieving 95% code coverage
Developed 15+ client websites with modern React/Node.js stack
Implemented responsive designs and optimized for 100% Lighthouse scores
Built custom CMS solutions reducing content management time by 70%
Integrated third-party APIs and payment gateways for e-commerce solutions

details: Relevant Courses: Machine Learning, Computer Vision, AI, Distributed Systems, Cybersecurity
Capstone Project: AI-powered inventory optimization system
Research Assistant: Computer Vision lab working on object detection algorithms

hobbies.name: Brazilian Jiu-Jitsu
hobbies.desc: Purple belt competitor. Teaches discipline, problem-solving under pressure, and strategic thinking. Competed in 10+ tournaments with podium finishes.

hobbies.name: AI/ML Research
hobbies.desc: Active contributor to open-source ML projects. Building personal AI models for computer vision and natural language processing. Published 2 technical blog posts on ML system design.

hobbies.name: Fitness & Wellness
hobbies.desc: Strength training and conditioning. Maintaining peak physical and mental performance. Certified personal trainer helping others achieve their fitness goals.

achievements: Led cross-functional team of 8 engineers to deliver critical feature 2 weeks ahead of schedule
Reduced system downtime by 99.9% through improved monitoring and alerting
Mentored 5 junior developers to senior level within 18 months
Published 3 technical articles on system design and AI/ML best practices
Speaker at 2 tech conferences on microservices architecture and performance optimization
Open source contributor with 500+ stars across personal projects
